Package org.neo4j.kernel.impl.query

Interface TransactionalContext

    • Method Detail

      • valueMapper

        ValueMapper<Object> valueMapper()

      • executingQuery

        ExecutingQuery executingQuery()

      • kernelTransaction

        KernelTransaction kernelTransaction()

      • transaction

        InternalTransaction transaction()

      • isTopLevelTx

        boolean isTopLevelTx()

      • close

        void close()
        This should be called once the query is finished, either successfully or not. Should be called from the same thread the query was executing in.

      • rollback

        void rollback()
        Close and rollback transaction context. For cases when exception occurred during query execution and owning transaction should be rolledback

      • terminate

        void terminate()
        This is used to terminate a currently running query. Can be called from any thread. Will roll back the current transaction if it is still open.

        long commitAndRestartTx()
